20. ... Bxh4 21. Qxg7 Qf8 22. Qxf8+ (else ... Rg8 followed by Rxg2+) Rxf8 23. Nxc5 b6 followed by 24. ... Rg8 25. g3 with a slight advantage for Black with the extra piece.
